title: What is the best umbrella if it rains money? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it’s raining money, you don’t need a umbrella, you need a high-powered vacuum. I recommend the Dyson brand. However, if you are truly looking for the very best umbrella, I got that info just for you. The umbrella I have is 95% UV protective. It will surely protect your skin from the harsh rays of the sun. Also, it is highly wind and heavy rain resistant. I prefer lightweight and travel-size umbrellas. Here’s a video where I explain why it’s the best umbrella to buy on Amazon:
